data.name: Awesomenauts - Party Boy McPain Skin
data.detailed_description:
It's time to get wild, baby! Celebrating a Bachelorette, Bar Mitzvah, Birthday, Graduation, or want to spice up your family Christmas dinner? No matter the occasion, you can hire Party Boy McPain for your next event. Anytime... Anywhere... Saddle up!

This DLC contains a custom skin for Ted McPain in Awesomenauts. You need to have Ted McPain available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game. This skin contains a fully customized voice set!

data.short_description: It's time to get wild, baby! Celebrating a Bachelorette, Bar Mitzvah, Birthday, Graduation, or want to spice up your family Christmas dinner? No matter the occasion, you can hire Party Boy McPain for your next event. Anytime... Anywhere... Saddle up! This DLC contains a custom skin for Ted McPain in Awesomenauts.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX version 10.7 (Lion) or later
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Lion 10.7 or later.
  • Processor: Any Processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
